lead_paragraph: On “Good Morning America,” a spokeswoman, Sarah Huckabee Sanders, said President Trump continued to believe he was wiretapped by President Barack Obama.
snippet: On “Good Morning America,” a spokeswoman, Sarah Huckabee Sanders, said President Trump continued to believe he was wiretapped by President Barack Obama....

headline.main: In David Shields’s Brief Essays, People May Be Farther Than They Appear
